verses.verse: And now <S%H3478><s%>, O Israel, hearken <S%H8085><s%> unto the statutes <S%H2706><s%> and unto the ordinances <S%H4941><s%>, which I teach <S%H3925><s%> you <S%H6213><s%>, to do them <S%H2421><s%>; that ye may live, and go in <S%H935><s%> and possess <S%H3423><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of your fathers <S%H1><s%>, giveth you <S%H5414><s%>.

Ye shall not add <S%H3254><s%> unto the word <S%H1697><s%> which I command <S%H6680><s%> you <S%H1639><s%>, neither shall ye diminish from it <S%H8104><s%>, that ye may keep the commandments <S%H4687><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> which I command you <S%H6680><s%>.

Your eyes <S%H5869><s%> have seen <S%H7200><s%> what Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> because of Baal-peor <S%H1187><s%>; for all the men <S%H376><s%> that followed <S%H310><s%> Baal-peor <S%H1187><s%>, Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> hath destroyed <S%H8045><s%> them from the midst of thee <S%H7130><s%>.
But ye that did cleave <S%H1695><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> are alive <S%H2416><s%> every one of you this day <S%H3117><s%>.

Behold <S%H7200><s%>, I have taught <S%H3925><s%> you statutes <S%H2706><s%> and ordinances <S%H4941><s%>, even as <S%H834><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> my God <S%H430><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> me <S%H6213><s%>, that ye should do so in <S%H7130><s%> the midst of the land <S%H776><s%> whither ye go <S%H935><s%> in to possess it <S%H3423><s%>.

Keep <S%H8104><s%> therefore and do <S%H6213><s%> them <S%H2451><s%>; for this is your wisdom and your understanding <S%H998><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the peoples <S%H5971><s%>, that shall hear <S%H8085><s%> all these statutes <S%H2706><s%>, and say <S%H559><s%>, Surely this great <S%H1419><s%> nation <S%H1471><s%> is a wise <S%H2450><s%> and understanding <S%H995><s%> people <S%H5971><s%>.

For what great <S%H1419><s%> nation <S%H1471><s%> is there <S%H430><s%>, that hath a god so nigh <S%H7138><s%> unto them <S%H3068><s%>, as Jehovah our God <S%H430><s%> is whensoever we call upon him <S%H7121><s%>?

And what great <S%H1419><s%> nation <S%H1471><s%> is there <S%H2706><s%>, that hath statutes and ordinances <S%H4941><s%> so righteous <S%H6662><s%> as all this law <S%H8451><s%>, which I set <S%H5414><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you this day <S%H3117><s%>?

Only take heed <S%H8104><s%> to thyself <S%H8104><s%>, and keep thy soul <S%H5315><s%> diligently <S%H3966><s%>, lest thou forget <S%H7911><s%> the things <S%H1697><s%> which thine eyes <S%H5869><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%>, and lest they depart <S%H5493><s%> from thy heart <S%H3824><s%> all the days <S%H3117><s%> of thy life <S%H2416><s%>; but make them known <S%H3045><s%> unto thy children <S%H1121><s%> and thy children <S%H1121><s%>'s children <S%H1121><s%>;

the day <S%H3117><s%> that thou stoodest <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> in Horeb <S%H2722><s%>, when Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto me <S%H6950><s%>, Assemble me <S%H6950><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%>, and I will make them hear <S%H8085><s%> my words <S%H1697><s%>, that they may learn <S%H3925><s%> to fear <S%H3372><s%> me all the days <S%H3117><s%> that they live <S%H2416><s%> upon the earth <S%H127><s%>, and that they may teach <S%H3925><s%> their children <S%H1121><s%>.

And ye came near <S%H7126><s%> and stood <S%H5975><s%> under the mountain <S%H2022><s%>; and the mountain <S%H2022><s%> burned <S%H1197><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%> unto the heart <S%H3820><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%>, with darkness <S%H6205><s%>, cloud <S%H2822><s%>, and thick darkness.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto you out of the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the fire <S%H784><s%>: ye heard <S%H8085><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of words <S%H1697><s%>, but ye saw <S%H7200><s%> no form <S%H8544><s%>; only <S%H2108><s%> ye heard a voice <S%H6963><s%>.

And he declared <S%H5046><s%> unto you his covenant <S%H1285><s%>, which he commanded <S%H6680><s%> you to perform <S%H6213><s%>, even the ten <S%H6235><s%> commandments <S%H1697><s%>; and he wrote <S%H3789><s%> them upon two <S%H8147><s%> tables <S%H3871><s%> of stone <S%H68><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> me at that time <S%H6256><s%> to teach <S%H3925><s%> you statutes <S%H2706><s%> and ordinances <S%H4941><s%>, that ye might do <S%H6213><s%> them in the land <S%H776><s%> whither ye go over <S%H5674><s%> to possess it <S%H3423><s%>.

Take ye therefore good <S%H3966><s%> heed <S%H8104><s%> unto yourselves <S%H5315><s%>; for ye saw <S%H7200><s%> no manner of form <S%H8544><s%> on the day <S%H3117><s%> that Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto you in Horeb <S%H2722><s%> out of the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the fire <S%H784><s%>.

Lest ye corrupt <S%H7843><s%> yourselves <S%H6213><s%>, and make you a graven image <S%H6459><s%> in the form <S%H8544><s%> of any figure <S%H5566><s%>, the likeness <S%H8403><s%> of male <S%H2145><s%> or female <S%H5347><s%>,

the likeness <S%H8403><s%> of any beast <S%H929><s%> that is on the earth <S%H776><s%>, the likeness <S%H8403><s%> of any winged <S%H3671><s%> bird <S%H6833><s%> that flieth <S%H5774><s%> in the heavens <S%H8064><s%>,

the likeness <S%H8403><s%> of anything that creepeth <S%H7430><s%> on the ground <S%H127><s%>, the likeness <S%H8403><s%> of any fish <S%H1710><s%> that is in the water <S%H4325><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%>;

and lest thou lift up <S%H5375><s%> thine eyes <S%H5869><s%> unto heaven <S%H8064><s%>, and when thou seest <S%H7200><s%> the sun <S%H8121><s%> and the moon <S%H3394><s%> and the stars <S%H3556><s%>, even all the host <S%H6635><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%>, thou be drawn <S%H5080><s%> away and worship <S%H7812><s%> them <S%H5647><s%>, and serve them <S%H3068><s%>, which Jehovah thy God <S%H430><s%> hath allotted <S%H2505><s%> unto all the peoples <S%H5971><s%> under the whole heaven <S%H8064><s%>.

But Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath taken <S%H3947><s%> you <S%H3318><s%>, and brought you forth out of the iron <S%H1270><s%> furnace <S%H3564><s%>, out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, to be unto him a people <S%H5971><s%> of inheritance <S%H5159><s%>, as at this day <S%H3117><s%>.

Furthermore Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> was angry <S%H599><s%> with me for your sakes <S%H1697><s%>, and sware <S%H7650><s%> that I should not go over <S%H5674><s%> the Jordan <S%H3383><s%>, and that I should not go <S%H935><s%> in unto that good <S%H2896><s%> land <S%H776><s%>, which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> giveth <S%H5414><s%> thee for an inheritance <S%H5159><s%>:

but I must die <S%H4191><s%> in this land <S%H776><s%>, I must not go over <S%H5674><s%> the Jordan <S%H3383><s%>; but ye shall go over <S%H5674><s%>, and possess <S%H3423><s%> that good <S%H2896><s%> land <S%H776><s%>.

Take heed <S%H8104><s%> unto yourselves <S%H7911><s%>, lest ye forget the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>, which he made <S%H3772><s%> with you <S%H6213><s%>, and make you a graven image <S%H6459><s%> in the form <S%H8544><s%> of anything <S%H3605><s%> which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> hath forbidden thee <S%H6680><s%>.
For Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> is a devouring <S%H398><s%> fire <S%H784><s%>, a jealous <S%H7067><s%> God <S%H430><s%>.

When thou shalt beget <S%H3205><s%> children <S%H1121><s%>, and children <S%H1121><s%>'s children <S%H1121><s%>, and ye shall have been long <S%H3462><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%>, and shall corrupt <S%H7843><s%> yourselves <S%H6213><s%>, and make a graven image <S%H6459><s%> in the form <S%H8544><s%> of anything <S%H6213><s%>, and shall do that which is evil <S%H7451><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%>, to provoke him to anger <S%H3707><s%>;

I call <S%H5749><s%> heaven <S%H8064><s%> and earth <S%H776><s%> to witness <S%H5749><s%> against you this day <S%H3117><s%>, that ye shall soon <S%H4118><s%> utterly <S%H6><s%> perish <S%H6><s%> from off the land <S%H776><s%> whereunto ye go over <S%H5674><s%> the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> it <S%H748><s%>; ye shall not prolong your days <S%H3117><s%> upon it <S%H8045><s%>, but shall utterly be destroyed <S%H8045><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will scatter <S%H6327><s%> you among the peoples <S%H5971><s%>, and ye shall be left <S%H7604><s%> few <S%H4962><s%> in number <S%H4557><s%> among the nations <S%H1471><s%>, whither Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> shall lead you away <S%H5090><s%>.

And there ye shall serve <S%H5647><s%> gods <S%H430><s%>, the work <S%H4639><s%> of men <S%H120><s%>'s hands <S%H3027><s%>, wood <S%H6086><s%> and stone <S%H68><s%>, which neither see <S%H7200><s%>, nor hear <S%H8085><s%>, nor eat <S%H398><s%>, nor smell <S%H7306><s%>.

But from thence ye shall seek <S%H1245><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%>, and thou shalt find <S%H4672><s%> him <S%H1875><s%>, when thou searchest after him with all thy heart <S%H3824><s%> and with all thy soul <S%H5315><s%>.

When thou art in tribulation <S%H6862><s%>, and all these things <S%H1697><s%> are come <S%H4672><s%> upon thee <S%H319><s%>, in the latter days <S%H3117><s%> thou shalt return <S%H7725><s%> to Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%>, and hearken <S%H8085><s%> unto his voice <S%H6963><s%>:

for Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> is a merciful <S%H7349><s%> God <S%H430><s%>; he will not fail <S%H7503><s%> thee <S%H7843><s%>, neither destroy thee <S%H7911><s%>, nor forget the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of thy fathers <S%H1><s%> which he sware unto them <S%H7650><s%>.

For ask <S%H7592><s%> now of the days <S%H3117><s%> that are past <S%H7223><s%>, which were <S%H1961><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee <S%H3117><s%>, since the day that God <S%H430><s%> created <S%H1254><s%> man <S%H120><s%> upon the earth <S%H776><s%>, and from the one end <S%H7097><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%> unto the other <S%H1419><s%>, whether there hath been any such thing as this great thing <S%H1697><s%> is <S%H8085><s%>, or hath been heard like it?

Did ever a people <S%H5971><s%> hear <S%H8085><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> speaking out <S%H1696><s%> of the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the fire <S%H784><s%>, as thou hast heard <S%H8085><s%>, and live <S%H2421><s%>?

Or hath God <S%H430><s%> assayed <S%H5254><s%> to go <S%H935><s%> and take <S%H3947><s%> him a nation <S%H1471><s%> from the midst <S%H7130><s%> of another nation <S%H1471><s%>, by trials <S%H4531><s%>, by signs <S%H226><s%>, and by wonders <S%H4159><s%>, and by war <S%H4421><s%>, and by a mighty <S%H2389><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%>, and by an outstretched <S%H5186><s%> arm <S%H2220><s%>, and by great <S%H1419><s%> terrors <S%H4172><s%>, according to all that Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> for you in Egypt <S%H4714><s%> before your eyes <S%H5869><s%>?
Unto thee it was showed <S%H7200><s%>, that thou mightest know <S%H3045><s%> that Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> he is God <S%H430><s%>; there is none else <S%H5750><s%> besides him <S%H905><s%>.

Out of heaven <S%H8064><s%> he made thee to hear <S%H8085><s%> his voice <S%H6963><s%>, that he might instruct <S%H3256><s%> thee <S%H776><s%>: and upon earth he made thee to see <S%H7200><s%> his great <S%H1419><s%> fire <S%H784><s%>; and thou heardest <S%H8085><s%> his words <S%H1697><s%> out of the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the fire <S%H784><s%>.

And because he loved <S%H157><s%> thy fathers <S%H1><s%>, therefore he chose <S%H977><s%> their seed <S%H2233><s%> after <S%H310><s%> them <S%H3318><s%>, and brought thee out with his presence <S%H6440><s%>, with his great <S%H1419><s%> power <S%H3581><s%>, out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>;

to drive out <S%H3423><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> thee greater <S%H1419><s%> and mightier <S%H6099><s%> than thou <S%H935><s%>, to bring thee in <S%H5414><s%>, to give thee their land <S%H776><s%> for an inheritance <S%H5159><s%>, as at this day <S%H3117><s%>.

Know <S%H3045><s%> therefore this day <S%H3117><s%>, and lay <S%H7725><s%> it to thy heart <S%H3824><s%>, that Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> he is God <S%H430><s%> in heaven <S%H8064><s%> above <S%H4605><s%> and upon the earth beneath <S%H776><s%>; there is none else.

And thou shalt keep <S%H8104><s%> his statutes <S%H2706><s%>, and his commandments <S%H4687><s%>, which I command <S%H6680><s%> thee this day <S%H3117><s%>, that it may go well <S%H3190><s%> with thee <S%H1121><s%>, and with thy children after <S%H310><s%> thee <S%H748><s%>, and that thou mayest prolong thy days <S%H3117><s%> in the land <S%H127><s%>, which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> giveth thee <S%H5414><s%>, for ever.
Then Moses <S%H4872><s%> set apart <S%H914><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> beyond <S%H5676><s%> the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> toward the sunrising <S%H8121><s%>;

that the manslayer <S%H7523><s%> might flee <S%H5127><s%> thither <S%H7523><s%>, that slayeth his neighbor <S%H7453><s%> unawares <S%H1097><s%>, and hated <S%H8130><s%> him not in time <S%H8543><s%> past <S%H8032><s%>; and that fleeing <S%H5127><s%> unto one <S%H259><s%> of these <S%H411><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> he might live <S%H2425><s%>:

namely <S%H1221><s%>, Bezer in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>, in the plain <S%H4334><s%> country <S%H776><s%>, for the Reubenites <S%H7206><s%>; and Ramoth <S%H7216><s%> in Gilead <S%H1568><s%>, for the Gadites <S%H1425><s%>; and Golan <S%H1474><s%> in Bashan <S%H1316><s%>, for the Manassites <S%H4520><s%>.
And this is the law <S%H8451><s%> which Moses <S%H4872><s%> set <S%H7760><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>:

these are the testimonies <S%H5713><s%>, and the statutes <S%H2706><s%>, and the ordinances <S%H4941><s%>, which Moses <S%H4872><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, when they came forth <S%H3318><s%> out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>,

beyond <S%H5676><s%> the Jordan <S%H3383><s%>, in the valley <S%H1516><s%> over against <S%H4136><s%> Beth-peor <S%H1047><s%>, in the land <S%H776><s%> of Sihon <S%H5511><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of the Amorites <S%H567><s%>, who dwelt <S%H3427><s%> at Heshbon <S%H2809><s%>, whom Moses <S%H4872><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> smote <S%H5221><s%>, when they came forth <S%H3318><s%> out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.

And they took his land <S%H776><s%> in possession <S%H3423><s%>, and the land <S%H776><s%> of Og <S%H5747><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Bashan <S%H1316><s%>, the two <S%H8147><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%> of the Amorites <S%H567><s%>, who were beyond <S%H5676><s%> the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> toward the sunrising <S%H4217><s%>;

from Aroer <S%H6177><s%>, which is on the edge <S%H8193><s%> of the valley <S%H5158><s%> of the Arnon <S%H769><s%>, even unto mount <S%H2022><s%> Sion <S%H7865><s%> (the same is Hermon <S%H2768><s%>),

and all the Arabah <S%H6160><s%> beyond <S%H5676><s%> the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> eastward <S%H4217><s%>, even unto the sea <S%H3220><s%> of the Arabah <S%H6160><s%>, under the slopes <S%H794><s%> of Pisgah <S%H6449><s%>.
